title: Drosophila Evolution in a Lab Set Member 5

content.question: Which of the following combinations of flies showed the highest number of mating instances?

choices.label: Males grown on maltose paired with females grown on starch
Males grown on starch paired with females grown on starch
Males grown on maltose paired with females grown on maltose
Males grown on starch paired with females grown on maltose

content.answer: Males grown on starch paired with females grown on starch

skill.text: 4.B: Describe data from a table or graph, including: i. identifying specific data points ii. describing trends and patterns in the data iii. describing relationships between variables
